options.lowShield.tooltip: While on, lowers the shield when shield-crouching for greater visibility
options.attackIndicatorValue.tooltip: Adjust this slider to change the value at which the Attack Indicator will charge to on screen. By default this is 2.0, to match CTS.
text.config.combatify-config.title: Combatify
text.config.combatify-config.option.mida: Allows Non-Projectile sources of damage to knock players up into the air even if they are already in the air
text.config.combatify-config.option.fist: Fist Damage is updated to 1, matching the change made to Bedrock Edition
text.config.combatify-config.option.shie: Only allows you to block with a shield during charge. Does not apply to swords.
text.config.combatify-config.option.satu: Healing relies on saturation as a buffer, rather than just taking hunger
text.config.combatify-config.option.fast: Allows for fast healing like in 1.11+ when you have high saturation
text.config.combatify-config.option.proj: Determines if projectile damage sources have I-Frames
text.config.combatify-config.option.magi: Determines if magic damage sources have I-Frames
text.config.combatify-config.option.auto: Option for servers which will prevent using auto-attack on client
text.config.combatify-config.option.bowM: Bow damage is influenced by the arrow momentum
text.config.combatify-config.option.conf: Adds Knives and Longswords with their own respective stats and abilities.
text.config.combatify-config.option.pier: Adds enchantment Piercer, which allows for disabling of shields, as well as adding 10% armor piercing. Incompat with Cleaving.
text.config.combatify-config.option.defe: Adds enchantment Defender, which decreases shield disable time by 0.5s, and increases protection for shields and swords.
text.config.combatify-config.option.atta: If disabled and your tool is maxed attack speed, will prevent attacks from resetting. If all speed configs are maxed out, will also apply to every other item, and your fists.
text.config.combatify-config.option.ctsA: Determines whether or not weapons will deal less damage than they do in 1.9
text.config.combatify-config.option.maxW: Ticks to wait before disconnecting from server
text.config.combatify-config.option.swor: Modifies the strength of sword blocking by intervals of 0.125
text.config.combatify-config.option.base: Wooden, Stone, and Gold Longsword Damage Bonus
text.config.combatify-config.option.iron: Iron and Diamond Longsword Damage Bonus
text.config.combatify-config.option.base: Wooden, Stone, and Gold Hoe Damage Bonus
text.config.combatify-config.option.iron: Iron and Diamond Hoe Damage Bonus
text.config.combatify-config.option.gold: Golden, Diamond, Netherite Hoe Speed Offset
text.config.combatify-config.option.slow: Slowest Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
Slow Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
text.config.combatify-config.option.fast: Fast Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
Fastest Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
